content.body: ohhhh very nice!

Yeah it doesn't discriminate on any kind of file type really, but for right now at least it is basically just the rewrapper in non-website form + some "automatically find the spec file to format in this directory" logic. I'm now working on making it only apply to the changes in your current branch
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Yeah it doesn't discriminate on any kind of file type really, but for right now at least it is basically just the rewrapper in non-website form + some "automatically find the spec file to format in this directory" logic. I'm now working on making it only apply to the changes in your current branch
